description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/07/2005

Eric continues to convince Brooke that his plan for getting Forrester Creations back will work, however Brooke is skeptical.  The two are nearly caught when Taylor eavesdrops in on their conversation, but they see her there and quickly stage a phony argument to protect their plan.  Felicia refuses to tell Nick the truth, but Stephanie insists.  Stephanie calls Nick over then tells him that Felicia’s baby is his.
